context: Teladoc provides virtual care, mental health (BetterHelp), and chronic care management. The company faces competition from healthcare giants building telehealth into broader offerings.

competitors.name: Amazon One Medical
competitors.notes: Amazon's primary care and virtual care

competitors.name: CVS Health
competitors.notes: Integrated care with insurance, clinics, and virtual

competitors.name: UnitedHealth/Optum
competitors.notes: Healthcare giant with virtual care integration

competitors.name: Health Systems
competitors.notes: Epic MyChart and health system platforms
